pages.text: The Item Pipes transport items from a input to an output following the next rules.$(br2)$(li)Items will move down if possible. $(li)Items will move forward if possible. $(li)At an intersection, items will randomly flow left or right $(li)Items will not go upwards unless that's the only possibility $(li)Items attempting to enter a full cointainer will bounce back, then, they will avoid that direction if possible. $(li)Items will not flow into disabled pipes $(li)Items will fall out of pipes with momentum and enter pipes with open ends $(li)Comparators can read how many items are in a pipe $(li)A pipe with 15 or more items inside at once will break
